Developer: Oleksandr Diomin
 This program allows the conversion between different units with the help of simple and clear steps.
 UNITS:
 Data Storage conversion
 Data Speed Conversion
 Temperature units conversion


Steps to perform:
 1. Choose the radio-button with the unit you need.
 2. Enter value for this unit in the left edditable field below.
 3. Press "Calculate" button.


The result you need would be displayed in the right editable field below.
